name: perserverance
description:
This is two layers of VQGAN+CLIP animation composited in TouchDesigner and then heavily edited in Video Pro X. I was actually surprised at how much heavy lifting that program is capable of, all of it possible in TouchDesigner but this was just a bit quicker.

Originally an infinitely spiraling loop of the camera's descent into a cameo mask, now more abstracted into the colorful form you see now.
